value:
$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No! Stay away from here, you
nasty, no-good nightmares!$k$pTurn back! I won't let you do
anything to harm the mortal folk!$k$p$EFace_Pain|But...wait. Wait! You mustn't harm
us ljósálfar either!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That's— It can't be!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Sounds like someone is under attack!
Quick—let's dispatch the enemy and
save her!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh, thank you so much for saving me!
My name is—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Peony...isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Wh-what? You remember me?
How unusual!$k$pWhen your kind wake from dreams,
you should usually forget all about
us ljósálfar...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse, do you...know her?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. She's from...$k$pOh, right. I have a favor to ask
of you, Peony.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|A favor? Ooh! What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|When we first met, you were able
to dispel the nightmare incarnations
of Zacharias and the rest...$k$pCould you do the same to the
nightmares plaguing us in this
world now?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Well, I can certainly try! I may have
trouble handling some of the stronger
nightmares on my own though...$k$pNow, then... Nightmares, shoo!
Away with you! All bad dreams,
begone from here!$k$pThis is a place for happy things,
and happy things only!$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|*gasp*$k$pI... I remember now... I can't
believe I could ever forget you...
$EFace|Peony and $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|You remember me, Sharena?
Oh, I'm so very, very happy!$k$p$EFace_Pain|...I have news. Something terrible
has happened in Ljósálfheimr, and
we desperately need your help!$k$pDream-King Freyr has been taken to
Dökkálfheimr, the nightmare realm!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's why these terrible nightmares
have been appearing in this world in
such numbers...$k$pOhh... We simply HAVE to save
Dream-King Freyr!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A-all right, slow down... Tell us
everything, as it happened...$k$pFirst, though...I'm glad you're
here, Peony. Your presence
gives me hope.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Aw! I'm happy to see you too!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|There must be some solution to
resolving this chaos hidden within
the dream realms...$k$pAnd with you here, Peony, we might
actually stand a chance at finding
those solutions.$k$pAnd $Nu as well...$k$p$Sbs150|
